actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 92-313 with respect to the granting of exemptions to local units of the National Red Cross.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of General Services to provide space in Federal facilities to local units of the National Red Cross rent-free provided there are quarters available for rent but remain unrented. Requires any such local unit of the Red Cross to vacate such quarters when the Administrator succeeds in attaining 100 percent rental occupancy.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 92-313 with respect to the granting of exemptions to local units of the National Red Cross.
